text: Mohammad Ebrahim Bastani Parizi (12 December 1924 - 25 March 2014) was an Iranian historian and writer. He wrote over fifty non-fiction books. Most popular reads on topics such as the history of Iran. He was born in Kerman. Parizi died on 25 March 2014 in Tehran. He was 89 years old. He was outlived by his wife and children. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Iran Category:Iranian historians Category:Iranian writers
title: Mohammad Ebrahim Bastani Parizi
